# activityViewControllerProvider

**Instance Property**

A closure that provides an activity view controller for sharing the document.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activityViewControllerProvider: (() -> UIActivityViewController)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

To support sharing, assign a closure that returns a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityViewController] that you configure to share the document. When you set this property, a person can share the document by tapping the share button in the navigation item’s title menu.
